data.similar:
File::Find - File::Find::Rule is a wrapper hoping to provide a
    simpler interface to locating files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
File::Find::Rule builds on the functionality of File::Find.

    It seems to usefully scratch the itch of others for a less obtuse
    interface for finding files - people really have issues with the
    form of callback File::Find requires you write.
